extendedInfo.description: With the Adverts.ie app, you can now grab a bargain and post ads on the go, anywhere and at anytime.Adverts.ie has facilitated the sales and purchase of thousands of items across every type of category imaginable.Buy and sell in Irelandâs trusted marketplace using the free Adverts.ie Android App - Choose from over 400,000 items.Sellers:- Instant notifications about your ads direct to your phone- Post ads in less than a minute- Take photos direct from the app and add to your ad- Buy credits using Paypal - Respond to offers on your ad- Share your ads on Facebook and Twitter- Read your private messages and answer them on the go- Leave FeedbackBuyers:- Instant notifications on ads you are watching direct to your phone- Browse the site on the go- Check sellers' profile and feedback before placing an offer- Place offers and comments- Pay quickly and securely using the Buy Now button on Merchant ads- Easy access to your watchlist- Share ads on Facebook and Twitter- Email ads to a friendFeedback:Please send us your feedback and suggestions to support@adverts.ie, weâd love to hear from you.Note on app permissions: Upon installation the Adverts app requests a couple of additional permission to enable some of its core functionality , see below  a brief explanation of why the app needs them.- Permission to DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS : This permission is needed by the app to place calls to advertisers that provided a phone number . When opening the ad details page the app will present a button "Phone Advertiser" if a phone number is available.- Permission to  PREVENT PHONE FROM SLEEPING:This permission is requested by the app to enable registering with the Google notification service when the user has the "Receive on this Phone" push notification setting enabled.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars if there was a sound setting to accompany notification

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Excellent app but it destroys my battery in no time, HTC one.

reviews.title: Excellent site and app

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Could do with a bit more of the pc features when it comes to editing ads but otherwise excellent

reviews.title: App is still crap!
reviews.comment: Spent half an hour inputting an advert only for the bloody app to eat my lenghty description and reject the advert because \"description can\'t be left blank\"! Deleting this crap and can\'t be bothered reporting anymore faults and bugs. There are jjust too many.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: bad
reviews.comment: It is unresponsive and freezes a bit and the notifications doesnt make ring when received
